item.description:
As usual the first Thursday practice session is devoted to the most recent workshop. This is your time to practice and perfect whatever you learned at the workshop. it is best to practice with someone that was also in your same workshop. And it will be your choice to teach/show what you learned to some one that did not attend, giving away what you paid for.

The CSI's and Assistants will devote attention to the new folks, beginners and anyone that needs instruction on the Basic steps and turns.


The dance floor is always open for practice or open dance

Beginners Welcome!!
Men, Women, Singles, Couples


Doors open at 6:00pm.
Instructional Hour starts @6:15 p.m. - 7:15pm**
Courtesy Note:: Please be on time.
Practice outside of class is expected and necessary.

Steppin'Practice">Steppin'Practice 6:00 pm-8:30 pm.

**Certified Instruction provided by the CSSOB Team**

Full Bar!!
We welcome you to stop by to get an idea of what Chicago Style Steppin' is all about. There is a $5 participation fee to get on the dance floor, first visit is FREE. We ask that you patronize the bar and tip the staff for their services.

Hosted by:
www.steppersofboston.com

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Post Workshop - "Chicago Style" Steppers of Boston Class & Practice
